homeHero.subtext: Join our community designed specifically for Vietnamese students and professionals seeking to advance their careers in the United States. Get personalized guidance from industry experts and build your professional network.

achievements.title: Achievements
achievements.repBody: Our community includes over 500 members from diverse backgrounds across various industries and organizations, and we make sure that everybody is welcomed.
achievements.mentorBody: Our platform is powered by a diverse network of 100+ experienced professionals across the United States, bringing expertise from various industries and backgrounds.
achievements.industryBody: With over 15+ years of combined industry experience, our mentors provide deep insights and practical guidance based on real-world expertise.

JobAppTip.title: Job Application Tips
JobAppTip.subtitle: Real journeys, real results. See how CF Hub members landed their dream jobs and overcame career challenges.

CareerStories.title: Career Stories
CareerStories.subtitle: Real journeys, real results. See how CF Hub members landed their dream jobs and overcame career challenges.

trending.title: TRENDING
trending.subtitle: Discover the most popular articles and insights from our community

jobApp.title: Career Path Visualizer
jobApp.subtitle: Explore different career paths and discover your potential. See real success stories and find your perfect career trajectory.

cta.title: Ready to Start Your Journey?
cta.description: Join our community and get personalized guidance for your chosen career path.

footer.aboutBody1: VNPN is a network connecting Vietnamese professionals in the United States. Our mission is to create career opportunities for all members through access to recruiting insights, domain knowledge, and mentorship from experienced professionals.
footer.aboutBody2: VNPN is a non-profit initiative supported by the Vietnamese Youth and Students Association in the USA (sinhvienusa.org) and the VietChallenge competition (vietchallenge.org). The project is currently in Beta.
footer.copyright: Â© 2025 CF Hub Corporation - Official website of CF Hub Corporation.

words.toSecureJobs: to secure jobs and build successful careers in

aboutUs.title: About Us
aboutUs.intro: VNPN is a network connecting Vietnamese professionals in the United States. VNPN's mission is to create career development opportunities for all members by providing access to recruitment information, specialized knowledge, and mentorship from experienced professionals. VNPN hopes to contribute to building a cohesive and mutually supportive Vietnamese community abroad.

reasons.contribute: You want to contribute and help build the Vietnamese community in the United States
reasons.share: You want your experience to be shared and utilized
reasons.recruit: You want to find new members for your company
reasons.cofounder: You want to find a co-founder for your startup
reasons.referral: You want the opportunity to get an internal job referral
reasons.resume: You want your resume reviewed by experienced professionals in the same field
reasons.mentor: You want to find an experienced mentor for career development
reasons.insights: You want to learn about companies you're interested in from the perspective of Vietnamese people working there
reasons.connect: You want to connect with other members working across the United States

aboutUs.nonprofit: VNPN is a non-profit project, implemented with support from the Association of Vietnamese Youth and Students in the United States (
aboutUs.betaNote: ). The project is currently being tested in the Beta phase.
